text: Kurt "Kuddel" Liebrecht (born 24 December 1936 in Stendal) is a former East German footballer. He was a midfielder. Liebrecht played for 1. FC Lok Stendal. He also played for the East Germany national football team. ==References== * http://eu-football.info Category:1936 births Category:East German sportspeople Category:German footballers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Kurt Liebrecht
